{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.03731v1", "title": "Weiss derivatives of holomorphic maps", "summary": "We propose an orthogonal approach to the stable homotopy type of spaces of
holomorphic maps to projective space. We study the Weiss towers of the unitary
functors of holomorphic and continuous maps to $\mathbb{P}(V)$, and show that
the former is polynomial and completely compute the latter. As an application
we give a new proof of a stable splitting of Cohen--Cohen--Mann--Milgram.", "main_category": "math.AT", "categories": "math.AT,math.AG", "published": "2025-05-06T17:58:17Z"}
